item.title: All Star Tower Defense X (ASTDX) Codes (July 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Create your dream team with these codes for free rewards.

Looking for All Star Tower Defense X codes? You've come to the right place. This selection of codes will help you earn Stat Dice, Trait Burners, Skill Orbs, Bounded Cubes, and more. These can be used to reroll a unit's stats, unlock new traits for your units, and even keep certain stats protected before you reroll.

All Working All Star Tower Defense X Codes (July 2025)

  • AFIRSTTIME3001 - 500x Gems, 5x Basic Capsule, 20x Trait Burner, 2x Skill Orb Bag, 1x Cloud Summon
  • FREENIMBUSMOUNT - Rewards (must be level 10 to redeem)
  • somanylikes - Rewards (must be level 5 to redeem)
  • FORTYFIVELIKES - Rewards (must be level 5 to redeem)
  • ONEEIGHTYFIVELIKES - 500x Gems- 1x Cookin Love, 15x Trait Burner, 10x Stat Dice, 10x Bounded Cube

All Expired All Star Tower Defense X Codes (July 2025)

The following codes have now expired, but feel free to try them still and see if you get lucky!

  • VERYHIGHLIKEB

How to Redeem All Star Tower Defense X Codes

The process for redeeming codes in All Star Tower Defense X is thankfully a simple one. So, now that you know which codes are working, here's how to use them.

  1. Login to Roblox and load up the All Star Tower Defense X experience
  2. Look for the bird icon in the bottom left corner. It's not one of the colorful icons, but a black and white one.
  3. Enter the code into the box and hit redeem
  4. Enjoy your freebies and good luck with creating your team!

Why Isn't All Star Tower Defense X Code Working?

There are usually two reasons why a code isn't working. It's either because:

  • The code is expired
  • The code has been entered incorrectly

If a code has been entered incorrectly or is expired, it will say the "code is invalid." To stop this from happening, we'd recommend copying and pasting the code directly from this article. We check and test each of the codes before we add them to our articles. However, when copying them, you can sometimes accidentally include an extra space somewhere, so always double check there's no additional spaces!

Lauren Harper is an Associate Guides Editor. She loves a variety of games but is especially fond of puzzles, horrors, and point-and-click adventures.

In This Article



https://www.ign.com/articles/all-star-tower-defense-x-codes

item.title: Climb and Jump Tower Codes (June 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Searching for Climb and Jump Tower codes? We've got all the active codes for this Roblox experience, so you don't have to hunt them down. Redeem each one for rewards like souvenir boxes and boosts to speed you up. Some boosts even provide extra luck so you can get rarer pets when hatching eggs.

Working Climb and Jump Tower Codes (June 2025)

Here are all the current active codes you can redeem in Climb and Jump Tower. Certain codes seem to have different rewards per person, so there's no guarantee you'll get the same thing for those:

  • TITAN - Rewards (NEW)
  • GIANT - 1 Golden Egg Box
  • PIXEL - 1 Pixel Box
  • 70MVISIT - Rewards
  • 40MVISIT - Rewards

Expired Climb and Jump Tower Codes (June 2025)

The below codes have unfortunately expired and will no longer work. We've included them here so you don't try to redeem them:

  • IRONMAN

How to Redeem Climb and Jump Tower Codes

Knowing how to redeem codes in Climb and Jump Tower can be confusing if you don't know where to look. Follow these simple steps to learn how to get those juicy rewards:

  1. Launch Climb and Jump Tower on Roblox
  2. Look for the cog wheel button at the top right corner. As shown in the screenshot above, it's currently the fifth button.
  3. Press the cog wheel to reveal the Settings menu.
  4. Type your code into the "Enter Code" box at the bottom.
  5. Then press the green "USE" button when you're ready.

Why Isn't My Climb and Jump Tower Code Working?

If you're having trouble redeeming a code, there are two common reasons why it may not be working:

  • The code is expired
  • The code has been entered incorrectly

If a code has been entered incorrectly, you'll see a message that says, "This code is wrong! Check the code again!". In order to avoid this, we recommend copying and pasting the code directly from this article. As long as you don't accidentally get an extra space in there when copying it, it should work if it's active. We make sure to check and test every Climb and Jump Tower code before we add them to this article.

A common reason for codes to not work in this Roblox game is because they're case-sensitive. That means you have to type it exactly the same way in this article. Otherwise, it won't work if it has different letters capitalized or lowercase.

Where to Find More Climb and Jump Tower Codes

We always recommend checking our article here for up to date codes since you can rely on us to verify which ones are working. But, if you'd prefer to search for some Climb and Jump Tower codes on your own, you can check the dedicated Discord server.

What is Climb and Jump Tower in Roblox?

Climb and Jump Tower is a Roblox experience where the name tells you everything it's about. Climb massive tall towers based on real buildings like the Eiffel Tower or Empire State Building. As you work your way up each one, you'll gain coins upon gliding back down to the bottom. You can then spend those coins to unlock pets and upgrade your wings to climb faster and farther.

Jeffrey Lerman is a freelance game journalist for IGN who has been covering games for over a decade. You can follow him on Bluesky.



https://www.ign.com/articles/climb-and-jump-tower-codes

item.title: You'll Soon Be Able to Wear Animal Crossing on Your Feet, With These Nintendo-Licensed Crocs
item.content:encoded:
Fans of Animal Crossing and comfortable clogs rejoice — Nintendo's adorable life-sim series is coming to a pair of feet near you, thanks to a range of officially-licensed Crocs.

The shoes will go on sale later this summer with a platform clog design for adults and a classic kids clog design for children. Each is adorned with an Animal Crossing background, featuring fruit trees and a sandy shoreline.

And, of course, each can be customised with additional character charms, featuring Tom Nook, Isabelle and KK Slider, if you're willing to pay extra for the privilege.

The Animal Crossing Platform Clog for adults will cost $69.99, while the smaller Kids Animal Crossing Classic Clog will cost $54.99. Both are set to go on sale next month, on August 26.

Two packs of additional "jibbitz" charms will also available, priced at $16.99 — each. The first includes the three fashionable Sable sisters, plus a backpack and shirt. The second includes musuem owner Blathers, stargazing owl Celeste, scallop-loving Pascal, a fossil and a seashell.

Alternatively, you can pick up charms featuring villagers Rosie, Marshall or Bunnie for $4.99 each.

"Animal Crossing lets players enjoy a relaxing, slow-paced life while interacting with a cast of unique animal characters," Nintendo wrote, describing the introduction of this newly-licensed shoe range. "Since its debut in 2001, the games have been enjoyed by millions of players worldwide becoming a cherished title for fans of all ages. Now, for the first time ever, Crocs is partnering with Nintendo to debut a special collection launching Tuesday, August 26, 2025.

"This new collection features elements inspired by the lush, natural setting from the game. From the green tone that represents the land to the sole and strap inspired by the sea, see if you can discover all the Animal Crossing moments throughout the design of the shoe."

What next then for Animal Crossing, beyond shoes? Nintendo wound down ongoing support for Switch game Animal Crossing: New Horizons several years ago, despite its huge popularity. But with Switch 2 now released, a further sequel toetally feets inevitable. A shoo-in, if you will?

Tom Phillips is IGN's News Editor. You can reach Tom at tom_phillips@ign.com or find him on Bluesky @tomphillipseg.bsky.social



https://www.ign.com/articles/youll-soon-be-able-to-wear-animal-crossing-on-your-feet-with-these-nintendo-licensed-crocs
